ipxBasicSysTable.name: ipxBasicSysTable
ipxBasicSysTable.description: The IPX System table - basic information.

ipxBasicSysEntry.name: ipxBasicSysEntry
ipxBasicSysEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one instance of IPX running on the system.

ipxBasicSysInstance.name: ipxBasicSysInstance
ipxBasicSysInstance.description: The unique identifier of the instance of IPX to which this row corresponds. This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

ipxBasicSysExistState.name: ipxBasicSysExistState
ipxBasicSysExistState.description: The validity of this entry in the IPX system table. Setting this field to off indicates that this entry may be deleted from the system table at the IPX implementation's discretion.

ipxBasicSysNetNumber.name: ipxBasicSysNetNumber
ipxBasicSysNetNumber.description: The network number portion of the IPX address of this system.

ipxBasicSysNode.name: ipxBasicSysNode
ipxBasicSysNode.description: The node number portion of the IPX address of this system.

ipxBasicSysName.name: ipxBasicSysName
ipxBasicSysName.description: The readable name for this system.

ipxBasicSysInReceives.name: ipxBasicSysInReceives
ipxBasicSysInReceives.description: The total number of IPX packets received, including those received in error.

ipxBasicSysInHdrErrors.name: ipxBasicSysInHdrErrors
ipxBasicSysInHdrErrors.description: The number of IPX packets discarded due to errors in their headers, including any IPX packet with a size less than the minimum of 30 bytes.

ipxBasicSysInUnknownSockets.name: ipxBasicSysInUnknownSockets
ipxBasicSysInUnknownSockets.description: The number of IPX packets discarded because the destination socket was not open.

ipxBasicSysInDiscards.name: ipxBasicSysInDiscards
ipxBasicSysInDiscards.description: The number of IPX packets received but discarded due to reasons other than those accounted for by ipxBasicSysInHdrErrors, ipxBasicSysInUnknownSockets, ipxAdvSysInDiscards, and ipxAdvSysInCompressDiscards.

ipxBasicSysInBadChecksums.name: ipxBasicSysInBadChecksums
ipxBasicSysInBadChecksums.description: The number of IPX packets received with incorrect checksums.

ipxBasicSysInDelivers.name: ipxBasicSysInDelivers
ipxBasicSysInDelivers.description: The total number of IPX packets delivered locally, including packets from local applications.

ipxBasicSysNoRoutes.name: ipxBasicSysNoRoutes
ipxBasicSysNoRoutes.description: The number of times no route to a destination was found.

ipxBasicSysOutRequests.name: ipxBasicSysOutRequests
ipxBasicSysOutRequests.description: The number of IPX packets supplied locally for transmission, not including any packets counted in ipxAdvForwPackets.

ipxBasicSysOutMalformedRequests.name: ipxBasicSysOutMalformedRequests
ipxBasicSysOutMalformedRequests.description: The number of IPX packets supplied locally that contained errors in their structure.

ipxBasicSysOutDiscards.name: ipxBasicSysOutDiscards
ipxBasicSysOutDiscards.description: The number of outgoing IPX packets discarded due to reasons other than those accounted for in ipxBasicSysOutMalformedRequests, ipxAdvSysOutFiltered, and ipxAdvSysOutCompressDiscards.

ipxBasicSysOutPackets.name: ipxBasicSysOutPackets
ipxBasicSysOutPackets.description: The total number of IPX packets transmitted.

ipxBasicSysConfigSockets.name: ipxBasicSysConfigSockets
ipxBasicSysConfigSockets.description: The configured maximum number of IPX sockets that may be open at one time.

ipxBasicSysOpenSocketFails.name: ipxBasicSysOpenSocketFails
ipxBasicSysOpenSocketFails.description: The number of IPX socket open calls which failed.

ipxAdvSysTable.name: ipxAdvSysTable
ipxAdvSysTable.description: The IPX System table - advanced information.

ipxAdvSysEntry.name: ipxAdvSysEntry
ipxAdvSysEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one instance of IPX running on the system.

ipxAdvSysInstance.name: ipxAdvSysInstance
ipxAdvSysInstance.description: The unique identifier of the instance of IPX to which this row corresponds. This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

ipxAdvSysMaxPathSplits.name: ipxAdvSysMaxPathSplits
ipxAdvSysMaxPathSplits.description: The maximum number of paths with equal routing metric value which this instance of the IPX may split between when forwarding packets.

ipxAdvSysMaxHops.name: ipxAdvSysMaxHops
ipxAdvSysMaxHops.description: The maximum number of hops a packet may take.

ipxAdvSysInTooManyHops.name: ipxAdvSysInTooManyHops
ipxAdvSysInTooManyHops.description: The number of IPX packets discarded due to exceeding the maximum hop count.

ipxAdvSysInFiltered.name: ipxAdvSysInFiltered
ipxAdvSysInFiltered.description: The number of incoming IPX packets discarded due to filtering.

ipxAdvSysInCompressDiscards.name: ipxAdvSysInCompressDiscards
ipxAdvSysInCompressDiscards.description: The number of incoming IPX packets discarded due to decompression errors.

ipxAdvSysNETBIOSPackets.name: ipxAdvSysNETBIOSPackets
ipxAdvSysNETBIOSPackets.description: The number of NETBIOS packets received.

ipxAdvSysForwPackets.name: ipxAdvSysForwPackets
ipxAdvSysForwPackets.description: The number of IPX packets forwarded.

ipxAdvSysOutFiltered.name: ipxAdvSysOutFiltered
ipxAdvSysOutFiltered.description: The number of outgoing IPX packets discarded due to filtering.

ipxAdvSysOutCompressDiscards.name: ipxAdvSysOutCompressDiscards
ipxAdvSysOutCompressDiscards.description: The number of outgoing IPX packets discarded due to compression errors.

ipxAdvSysCircCount.name: ipxAdvSysCircCount
ipxAdvSysCircCount.description: The number of circuits known to this instance of IPX.

ipxAdvSysDestCount.name: ipxAdvSysDestCount
ipxAdvSysDestCount.description: The number of currently reachable destinations known to this instance of IPX.

ipxAdvSysServCount.name: ipxAdvSysServCount
ipxAdvSysServCount.description: The number of services known to this instance of IPX.

ipxCircEntry.name: ipxCircEntry
ipxCircEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one circuit known to the system.

ipxCircSysInstance.name: ipxCircSysInstance
ipxCircSysInstance.description: The unique identifier of the instance of IPX to which this entry corresponds. This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

ipxCircIndex.name: ipxCircIndex
ipxCircIndex.description: The identifier of this circuit, unique within the instance of IPX. This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

ipxCircExistState.name: ipxCircExistState
ipxCircExistState.description: The validity of this circuit entry. A circuit with this value set to off may be deleted from the table at the IPX implementation's discretion.

ipxCircOperState.name: ipxCircOperState
ipxCircOperState.description: The operational state of the circuit.

ipxCircIfIndex.name: ipxCircIfIndex
ipxCircIfIndex.description: The value of ifIndex for the interface used by this circuit. This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

ipxCircName.name: ipxCircName
ipxCircName.description: The readable name for the circuit.

ipxCircDialName.name: ipxCircDialName
ipxCircDialName.description: The symbolic name used to reference the dialing information used to create this circuit. This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

ipxCircLocalMaxPacketSize.name: ipxCircLocalMaxPacketSize
ipxCircLocalMaxPacketSize.description: The maximum size (including header), in bytes, that the system supports locally on this circuit.

ipxCircCompressState.name: ipxCircCompressState
ipxCircCompressState.description: The compression state on this circuit. This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

ipxCircCompressSlots.name: ipxCircCompressSlots
ipxCircCompressSlots.description: The number of compression slots available on this circuit. This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

ipxCircStaticStatus.name: ipxCircStaticStatus
ipxCircStaticStatus.description: Indicates whether the information about static routes and services reached via this circuit matches that saved in permanent storage (current). Setting the value to write when it had the value changed will write the currently in use information to permanent storage, if supported. Setting the value to read when it had the value changed will replace any routes and services currently defined for the circuit with those read from permanent storage, if supported.

ipxCircCompressedSent.name: ipxCircCompressedSent
ipxCircCompressedSent.description: The number of compressed packets sent.

ipxCircCompressedInitSent.name: ipxCircCompressedInitSent
ipxCircCompressedInitSent.description: The number of compression initialization packets sent.

ipxCircCompressedRejectsSent.name: ipxCircCompressedRejectsSent
ipxCircCompressedRejectsSent.description: The number of compressed packet rejected packets sent.

ipxCircUncompressedSent.name: ipxCircUncompressedSent
ipxCircUncompressedSent.description: The number of packets sent without being compressed even though compression was turned on for this circuit.

ipxCircCompressedReceived.name: ipxCircCompressedReceived
ipxCircCompressedReceived.description: The number of compressed packets received.

ipxCircCompressedInitReceived.name: ipxCircCompressedInitReceived
ipxCircCompressedInitReceived.description: The number of compression initialization packets received.

ipxCircCompressedRejectsReceived.name: ipxCircCompressedRejectsReceived
ipxCircCompressedRejectsReceived.description: The number of compressed packet rejected packets received.

ipxCircUncompressedReceived.name: ipxCircUncompressedReceived
ipxCircUncompressedReceived.description: The number of packets received without having been compressed even though compression was turned on for this circuit.

ipxCircMediaType.name: ipxCircMediaType
ipxCircMediaType.description: The media type used on this circuit.

ipxCircNetNumber.name: ipxCircNetNumber
ipxCircNetNumber.description: The IPX network number of this circuit.

ipxCircStateChanges.name: ipxCircStateChanges
ipxCircStateChanges.description: The number of times the circuit has changed state.

ipxCircInitFails.name: ipxCircInitFails
ipxCircInitFails.description: The number of times that initialization of this circuit has failed.

ipxCircDelay.name: ipxCircDelay
ipxCircDelay.description: The period of time, in milliseconds, that it takes to transmit one byte of data, excluding protocol headers, to a destination on the other end of the circuit, if the circuit is free of other traffic.

ipxCircThroughput.name: ipxCircThroughput
ipxCircThroughput.description: The amount of data, in bits per second, that may flow through the circuit if there is no other traffic.

ipxCircNeighRouterName.name: ipxCircNeighRouterName
ipxCircNeighRouterName.description: The name of the neighboring router on a WAN circuit.

ipxCircNeighInternalNetNum.name: ipxCircNeighInternalNetNum
ipxCircNeighInternalNetNum.description: The internal network number of the neighboring router on a WAN circuit.

ipxDestTable.name: ipxDestTable
ipxDestTable.description: The Destination table contains information about all known destinations.

ipxDestEntry.name: ipxDestEntry
ipxDestEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one destination.

ipxDestSysInstance.name: ipxDestSysInstance
ipxDestSysInstance.description: The unique identifier of the instance of IPX to which this row corresponds.

ipxDestNetNum.name: ipxDestNetNum
ipxDestNetNum.description: The IPX network number of the destination.

ipxDestProtocol.name: ipxDestProtocol
ipxDestProtocol.description: The routing protocol from which knowledge of this destination was obtained.

ipxDestTicks.name: ipxDestTicks
ipxDestTicks.description: The delay in ticks to reach this destination.

ipxDestHopCount.name: ipxDestHopCount
ipxDestHopCount.description: The number of hops necessary to reach the destination.

ipxDestNextHopCircIndex.name: ipxDestNextHopCircIndex
ipxDestNextHopCircIndex.description: The unique identifier of the circuit used to reach the next hop.

ipxDestNextHopNICAddress.name: ipxDestNextHopNICAddress
ipxDestNextHopNICAddress.description: The NIC address of the next hop.

ipxDestNextHopNetNum.name: ipxDestNextHopNetNum
ipxDestNextHopNetNum.description: The IPX network number of the next hop.

ipxStaticRouteTable.name: ipxStaticRouteTable
ipxStaticRouteTable.description: The Static Routes table contains information about all destinations reached via statically configured routes.

ipxStaticRouteEntry.name: ipxStaticRouteEntry
ipxStaticRouteEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one static route.

ipxStaticRouteSysInstance.name: ipxStaticRouteSysInstance
ipxStaticRouteSysInstance.description: The unique identifier of the instance of IPX to which this row corresponds.

ipxStaticRouteCircIndex.name: ipxStaticRouteCircIndex
ipxStaticRouteCircIndex.description: The unique identifier of the circuit used to reach the first hop in the static route.

ipxStaticRouteNetNum.name: ipxStaticRouteNetNum
ipxStaticRouteNetNum.description: The IPX network number of the route's destination.

ipxStaticRouteExistState.name: ipxStaticRouteExistState
ipxStaticRouteExistState.description: The validity of this static route. Entries with the value set to off may be deleted from the table at the implementation's discretion.

ipxStaticRouteTicks.name: ipxStaticRouteTicks
ipxStaticRouteTicks.description: The delay, in ticks, to reach the route's destination.

ipxStaticRouteHopCount.name: ipxStaticRouteHopCount
ipxStaticRouteHopCount.description: The number of hops necessary to reach the destination.

ipxServTable.name: ipxServTable
ipxServTable.description: The table of services, indexed by name and type.

ipxServEntry.name: ipxServEntry
ipxServEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one service.

ipxServSysInstance.name: ipxServSysInstance
ipxServSysInstance.description: The unique identifier of the instance of IPX to which this entry corresponds.

ipxServProtocol.name: ipxServProtocol
ipxServProtocol.description: The protocol from which knowledge of this service was obtained.

ipxServNetNum.name: ipxServNetNum
ipxServNetNum.description: The IPX network number portion of the IPX address of the service.

ipxServNode.name: ipxServNode
ipxServNode.description: The node portion of the IPX address of the service.

ipxServSocket.description: The socket portion of the IPX address of the service.

ipxServHopCount.name: ipxServHopCount
ipxServHopCount.description: The number of hops to the service.

ipxDestServEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one service.

ipxDestServSysInstance.description: The unique identifier of the instance of IPX to which this entry corresponds.

ipxDestServNode.description: The node portion of the IPX address of the service.

ipxDestServSocket.name: ipxDestServSocket
ipxDestServSocket.description: The socket portion of the IPX address of the service.

ipxDestServProtocol.name: ipxDestServProtocol
ipxDestServProtocol.description: The protocol from which knowledge of this service was obtained.

ipxDestServHopCount.name: ipxDestServHopCount
ipxDestServHopCount.description: The number of hops to the service.

ipxStaticServTable.name: ipxStaticServTable
ipxStaticServTable.description: The Static Services table contains information about all services reached via statically configured routes.

ipxStaticServEntry.name: ipxStaticServEntry
ipxStaticServEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one service.

ipxStaticServSysInstance.name: ipxStaticServSysInstance
ipxStaticServSysInstance.description: The unique identifier of the instance of IPX to which this entry corresponds.

ipxStaticServCircIndex.description: The circuit used to reach this service.

ipxStaticServExistState.description: The validity of this static service. Entries with the value set to off may be deleted from the table at the implementation's discretion.

ipxStaticServNode.description: The node portion of the IPX address of the service.
